attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A pub is an integrel part of our community .Why ? its where our fishing club is our cribbage team is our two darts teams our ladies dart team , our two football teams. pidgeon club,our two pool teams are .Its where you celibrate your 21st your wedding anniversary,A birth inthe family and yes eventually your Wake ? SO whats happened pubs are closeing at the rate of 68 a month due to profit loss of in excess of 30% . Pubs are worth more Dead than alive i.e convert to flats and houses .which is why the big Brewerys owners have changed their listing on the stock exchange to (REITS  ) REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUSTS.
Perhaps that is why they supported the total no smoking ban in the first instance .Now can you see whats happening .

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
